title: "Bridges"
output: html_document

```{r, echo = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)

main<- data.frame()
year<- numeric()

for(i in 10:16){
 url <- paste("https://www.fhwa.dot.gov/bridge/nbi/20", i, "/delimited/PR", i, ".txt", sep = "")
 dat <- read_csv(url, col_types = cols(RECORD_TYPE_005A = col_character(), DESIGN_LOAD_031 = col_character()))
 reduced<- select(dat, 1:2, 13, 16,20:21,27,30,31,33:36,41,48:49,67:71, 73, 75,102  )
 year<-  rep(paste(20, i, sep =""), dim(dat)[1])
  reduced<- cbind(reduced, year)
 main<-rbind(main, reduced)
}


```
